verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will wait for you, as long as it takes
Giving up my life, over for love

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
You've been searching for, How you've been yearning for
Hearts loyal to your own
So when you search the earth, looking for your friends
hear me sing my Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I am yours
Yes I am
Wholly Yours

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
You are my first love
You are my only one
Lord there is nothing else for me
Where else can I go
You have my heart alone
You are the only home I need
